experience.title: Research Intern
experience.description: Completed the internship under Dr. Achinta Kumar Samrah of Operation and Quantitative techniques department and did the analysis in field of transportation problems. - Analysed about 125 research papers out of the 600 and found out about Fuzzy transportation problems.- Design a word cloud regarding the same from the 125 papers- Formulated a report on " The comparison of various approaches to resolve a Fuzzy transportation problem"
